mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_room(room_id, account_id, product_id, reg_date) VALUES(#{roomId}, #{accountId},#{prdtId}, sysdate)
INSERT INTO chat_message(room_id, sender, content, send_date) VALUES(#{roomId}, #{sender}, #{content}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT room_id FROM chat_room WHERE product_id = #{prdtId} AND account_id = #{accountId}
SELECT case when count(room_id) >= 1 then 'EXISTED' else 'NOT_EXISTED' end as isexisted_room_id FROM chat_room WHERE product_id = #{prdtId} AND account_id = #{accountId}
